hero.title: Hi, I’m Negar 👋
hero.description: I’m a frontend developer eager to grow and collaborate with diverse teams. I love contributing to the community and have a strong interest in open-source software development. With a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of modern web technologies, I strive to create seamless and user-friendly digital experiences. I’m always looking for opportunities to learn, improve, and share knowledge with others👩🏻‍💻.
